author: Brian Heater
title: Bezos details Amazon’s COVID-19 testing plans in shareholder letter
description: Jeff Bezos dropped Amazon’s annual shareholder letter today, as the world struggles through the throes of a global pandemic. Naturally, the company’s response to the on-going COVID-19 crisis took center stage in the open letter, as the virus has impacted the …
